duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide excellent customer service and engage with customers warmly and proactively.
Meet or exceed solicitation goal for Belk credit Rewards program and clientele goals.
Understand store assortment and inventory available at other stores and on belk.com.
Meet or exceed personal sales per hour goals and increase units sold per transaction by recommending products to customers.
Identify and reduce shrinkage, work professionally with co-workers, customers, and managers, and maintain floor and stock areas consistent with store standards.
Follow procedures for all systems, comply with policies & procedures, and accept additional duties as requested by Sales Team Manager.
Assist Operations teams with all non-sell duties as assigned by Sales Team Manager.
